className.transform: const { size = 'md', variant = 'default' } = props; const sizes = { sm: 'w-4 h-4', md: 'w-5 h-5', lg: 'w-6 h-6' }; const variants = { default: 'text-foreground', muted: 'text-muted-foreground', primary: 'text-primary', destructive: 'text-destructive' }; return `inline-flex items-center justify-center ${sizes[size]} ${variants[variant]} ${props.className || ''}`
